ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($User.B2b_Bypass_Validation_Rules__c), ISCHANGED(B2b_Status__c), OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(B2b_Status__c,'Extracted'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(B2b_Status__c),'Integrated') ), AND( ISPICKVAL(B2b_Status__c,'Integrated'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(B2b_Status__c),'Extracted')) ), AND( ISPICKVAL(B2b_Status__c,'Extracted'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(B2b_Status__c),'To be Extracted')) ), AND( ISPICKVAL(B2b_Status__c,'To be Extracted'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(B2b_Status__c),'Extracted') ), AND( ISPICKVAL(B2b_Status__c,'To be Extracted'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(B2b_Status__c),'Integrated') ), AND( ISPICKVAL(B2b_Status__c,'New'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(B2b_Status__c),'Extracted') ) ) )
